data.name: Spacebase Startopia - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Want to enjoy some funky tunes while taking a break from space station management or going for a walk on the milkyway? The official Spacebase Startopia Soundtrack is the soundtrack you are looking for.
data.about_the_game: Want to enjoy some funky tunes while taking a break from space station management or going for a walk on the milkyway? The official Spacebase Startopia Soundtrack is the soundtrack you are looking for.
